batchUpdateWitnesses(address[],bytes32[].details: Batch update witnesses for multiple devices (offline update support) Allows authorized party to update witnesses for devices that were offline

params._witnesses: Corresponding array of new witness values

getDeviceWitness(address).details: Get the current witness for a device

getDevicesNeedingWitnessUpdate(uint256,u.details: Get devices that need witness updates (have old witnesses)

params._limit: Maximum number of devices to return

isDeviceValid(address).details: Check if a device's credentials are valid

massRevokeDevices(address[]).details: Mass revocation of multiple devices (efficient batch operation)

params._deviceAddresses: Array of device addresses to revoke

registerDevice(string,bytes32,string).details: Register a new IoT device with DID and optional credential hash

params._credentialHash: IPFS hash of the device's verifiable credential (optional)
params._publicKey: The device's public key for verification

params._deviceAddress: The address of the device to reinstate

revokeDevice(address).details: Revoke a device's credentials (implements EVOKE-style revocation) Updates the global accumulator to reflect the revocation

params._deviceAddress: The address of the device to revoke

setAccumulatorSnapshot(string).details: Update IPFS hash for accumulator snapshot Stores periodic snapshots of accumulator state for recovery/verification

params._ipfsHash: IPFS hash of the accumulator snapshot

setWitnessUpdateHash(string).details: Update IPFS hash for witness update batch Called after computing and storing new witnesses off-chain

params._ipfsHash: IPFS hash of the witness update data

params._credentialHash: New IPFS hash of the device's credential

updateDeviceWitness(bytes32).details: Update device accumulator witness (for EVOKE-style efficient revocation) Devices call this to get latest witness after accumulator updates

params._witness: The new witness value for the device
